Welcome to staXanov’s documentation!¶

StaXanov Web Application¶

StaXanov is a cutting-edge, web-based solution designed to seamlessly index folders, providing key statistics and insights. This lightweight and intuitive platform is tailored for businesses and individuals seeking to organize their data efficiently.
